    • testConsistency

      public void testConsistency() throws IOException
      Fat method where we start with a fat hbase:meta and then gradually intro problems running catalogjanitor for each to ensure it triggers complaint. Do one big method because takes a while to build up the context we need. We create three tables and then make holes, overlaps, add unknown servers and empty out regioninfo columns. Each should up counts in the CatalogJanitor.Report produced.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • incrementRow

      private static byte[] incrementRow(byte[] row)
      Take last byte and add one to it.
